channel.title: Loading jar
channel.description:
Hey so I'm using a 317 client, I've got two questions really.
First one, quite stupid, but I don't code client sided.
1)How do I find out whether my client is non renamed or renamed? I'm using erasedpkz Client if that helps ;P
2) How would I make it so users have to click run.bat, but it loads the jar file? So the download is small, but they still get the jframes and all that. Also, they can't access the files; it's just the jar file in there.
Thanks.

item.title: Loading jar
item.dc:creator: @pasta186 pasta186
item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

Hey so I’m using a 317 client, I’ve got two questions really.

First one, quite stupid, but I don’t code client sided.

1)How do I find out whether my client is non renamed or renamed? I’m using erasedpkz Client if that helps

  1. How would I make it so users have to click run.bat, but it loads the jar file? So the download is small, but they still get the jframes and all that. Also, they can’t access the files; it’s just the jar file in there.

Thanks.
